RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 46. Claiming Purse 20800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 31 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,00 0.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MERE BAG OF SHELLS had good early speed along the inside, shifted out three wide before a quarter, rallied through the turn to make the lead near the quarter pole, set the balance of the pace and drew off under srong handling to win as much the best. FAITHFUL SOLUTION with the second flight two wide, had a mild late rally in the four path and got up for second. TV TIZ GORGEOUS was fractious in the gate, trailed down the backstech and finished with good courage in the six path. TITEBLUEJEANS was restless in the gate, saved ground and went evenly. STARLITESLEW bobbled then was bumped at the start, prompted the pace two wide then along the inside into the stretch and faded late. MISS MARY JEAN drifted in bumping STARLITESLEW then bobbled at teg start, set a pressured pace three then two wide into the turn and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Titebluejeans
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, saved ground, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Faithful Solution
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, late rally, 4path, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Mere Bag of Shells
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, shifted 3w, surged turn, drew off, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Tv Tiz Gorgeous
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, trailed early, finished well 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Starliteslew
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, bumped start, pressed 2w, inside, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Mary Jean
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted in. bumped, bobbled start, set pressured pace, throug 1/2

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 31. Maiden Claiming Purse 17000. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOSH'N cway alerlty, raced widest down the backstretch wile chasing the leader in the six path, closed willingly two wide through deep stretch under mild left handed urging and got up in the final strides. BAD BOY BOOGIE away alertly, opened a clear lead soon after the start, set all the pace then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner in the final stages. NIKAO stalked the pace three then two wide and went evenly. CAN'T CRASHMYPARTY passed tiring rivals. MARK'S BUDDY JACIN failed to menace. MOR CRAFTY had brief speed inside.

ENTRY.NAME: Can't Crashmyparty
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Mor Crafty
ENTRY.OWNER: Poe Racing Stable LLC and 8 and 3 Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Bad Boy Boogie
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, sprinted clear, set pace, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Mark's Buddy Jacin
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Nikao
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3-2wide, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Josh'n
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, closed willingly, 2 wide, up in final strides,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 31, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 31 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. C laiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROLLIN ALL THE WAY never far back, rallied three wide through the turn to make the lead nearing the top of the stretch, set the balance of the pace and drew clear late under strong handling. CHECK OUT LINE bumped at the start, shifted out six wide soon thereafter, had a mild late rally and finished well clear for second. ST PATTY'S SONG trailed until mid stetch then passed tiring rivals. SHEZA POP STAR bumped at the start, pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then weakened. NORTHERN JOURNEY bumped at the start, had good early speed along the inside then faded. SISTER'S CREED broke outward bumping NORTHERN JOURNEYl at the start causing a chain reaction of bumping to her outside, set the early pace then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Sister's Creed
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, bumped start, early pace, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Journey
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start,inside speed, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Check Out Line
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, taken wide early, mild rally, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Pop Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: St Patty's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals late

ENTRY.NAME: Rollin All the Way
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Trusso Tony
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied 3 wide turn, drew off, forced out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 50. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHIQ IN THE VALLEY battled for the lead along the inside into the stretch, drew off under mild right handed urging and won as her rider pleased. WINDY VALLEY had good early speed along the inside, shifted out on the turn, rallied three wide through deep stretch and finished clear for second. COUNTRY STYLE matched strides with the winner two wide into the stretch then weakened late. J. P INDY trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Windy Valley
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, angled out turn, rallied 3w, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: J. P Indy
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Chiq in the Valley
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, drew off, right urging, as rider pleased,

ENTRY.NAME: Country Style
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 16600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 28 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Ohio Regis tered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SURF AND TURF was hustled from the gate, hung three wide into the clubhouse turn, settled with the second flight two wide, rallied thee wide through the far turn to make the lead in upper stretch and proved best under strong handling while fully extended. DISCLOSURE raced wide the entire trip, closed determinedly in the eight path through the stretch but was too late. FRANCO unhurried, early, rallied behind the winner through the far turn then was outfinished. PAT DADDY set a pressured pace along the inside into the stretch and weakened late. JACK'S ADVANTAGE was no factor. YOUVESAIDITALL was no threat. SKIDSTREAM pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then gave way. NOT YET CHARLIE with the second flight inside, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Pat Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Youvesaiditall
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Not Yet Charlie
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Jack's Advantage
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Surf and Turf
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled, stalked pace, rallied 3w 2nd turn, long drive, all out

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kenneth L. Ramsey & Sarah K. Ramsey

ENTRY.NAME: Disclosure
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide trip, closed willingly, 8path, too late

ENTRY.NAME: Skidstream
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Franco
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 62. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 31 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPECIALIZED chased the pace two and three wide, surged late under a corrective hand ride and was along in time. FAST CLIP broke in front and bore out, set all the pace then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. SWING STATE chased the pace along the inside, moved closer nearing the turn, lacked room causing his rider to check nearing the three furlong marker, dropped back then finished evenly along the rail. MAN'S CHOICE failed to menace. ORFANO was off slow then no threat. GOOD MUSIC trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Man's Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Orfano
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Good Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Swing State
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, checked 3/8pole, dropped back, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Specialized
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2-3wide, surged late, in time, corrective hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Clip
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out start, set pace mid stretch, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 31 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MASTER broke in full stride to set all the pace, turned back a challenge in mid stretch, drifted to the eight path under left handed urging and drew off late. AWESOME ENOUGH chased the winner, was carried out to the nine path through the stretch and gamely gained second. RIKIO stalked the pace into the stretch, loomed boldly along the rail nearing the furlong marker then was outfinished. TOYI offered a mild bid three wide into the stretch and was outfinished in the middle of the racetrack. ON HIS TOES never far back, swung wide and closed some ground late in the middle of the racetrack. AEGONTHECONQUEROR failed to menace. THE EQUINEST trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: The Equinest
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Rikio
ENTRY.OWNER: Cline, Robert and Lucas, Robert A.
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed boldly inside, upper stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Aegontheconqueror
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Enough
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, carried out, gamely gained second 9path

ENTRY.NAME: On His Toes
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, swung wide, mild gain mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Master
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, drifted 8path left urging, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Toyi
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, outfinished mid track

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 61. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 31 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $ 12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RONNI'S WIND away alertly, was allowed to settle, rallied three wide through the turn, made the lead at the top of the stretch and drew off under right handed urging to win as much the best. DANES LAST SONG reluctant to load, dueled for the lead two wide into the stretch, drifted to the six path and finished second best. OUR LAST SONG battled for the lead along the inside into the stretch then was outfinished. KAT TRAX had speed between horses two wide, was in tight at the seven sixteenths pole then went evenly. QUEENOFTHEBUCKEYE stumbled at the start, and was no factor. THE KID'S PRAYER had brief speed. HEART OF RUBY trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Heart of Ruby
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Our Last Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Kat Trax
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 2 wide, in tight 7/16pole, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Queenofthebuckeye
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: The Kid's Prayer
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Danes Last Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load, dueled 2w, drifted 6path, no match for winner

ENTRY.NAME: Ronni's Wind
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, settled, rallied 3 wide, full of run, much the best
